title: 30 Days of Night Omnibus, Vol. 1
description: Collects 30 Days of Night TPB (2003), 30 Days of Night: Dark Days TPB (2004), and 30 Days of Night: Return to Barrow TPB (2004). The vampire tale that put horror back on the map! 30 Days of Night Omnibus collects the original trilogy of stories told about Barrow, Alaska, and its deadly visitors, written by Steve Niles and illustrated by Ben Templesmith.
author: Steve Niles
